== Main Inclusion Report for gegl ==

=== Scope ===

gegl is needed for gimp 2.6 as the engine of new gimp version. Gimp is obviously in main.

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' <nowiki>[[http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/g/gegl]]</nowiki>; available for i386 and amd64
# ''Rationale:''
** New build dependency for Gimp 2.5 and so... 2.6, part of default installation
** The package is a new build dependency or dependency of a package that we already support.
0. ''Security:''
** No CVE entries
** No secunia history
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid. No daemon either.
** Doesn't open any port 
0. ''Quality assurance:''
** The package does not need configuration file (only ldconfig is called on configure)
** No debconf call.
** <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:gegl|Debian bugs]]</nowiki>: no showstoppers 
** <nowiki>[[http://packages.qa.debian.org/g/gegl.html|Maintenance in Debian]]</nowiki> is active (last version available)
** <nowiki>[[http://gegl.org/|Upstream]]</nowiki> is vigorous (new component)
** <nowiki>[[http://bugzilla.gnome.org/buglist.cgi?product=GEGL&bug_status=NEW&bug_status=ASSIGNED&bug_status=REOPENED&bug_status=UNCONFIRMED&bug_status=NEEDINFO|Upstream bug tracker]]</nowiki>
** Glib test program available in the build and activated in intrepid (made from the ./configure)
0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki> compliant.
** <nowiki>[[http://www.netfort.gr.jp/~dancer/column/libpkg-guide/libpkg-guide.html|Debian library packaging guide]]</nowiki> standards compliant.
** Packaging system is '''cdbs'''. No patch system used.
0. ''Dependencies:''
*** glel: libbabl-0.0-0 ('''babl will wait for inclusion in <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MainInclusionbabl|this MIR]]</nowiki>'''), libc6, libcairo2 , '''libgegl-0.0-0 (waiting for inclusion in this MIR)''', libglib2.0-0, libgtk2.0-0, libpng12-0
*** libglel-0.0.0: libbabl-0.0-0 (cf previously), libc6, libcairo2, libglib2.0-0, libgtk2.0-0, libjpeg62, libpango1.0-0, libpng12-0
*** libglel-0.0-dev: libgegl-0.0-0 (cf previously), libbabl-0.0-0-dev (cf previously)
*** libglel-0.0-doc: no dependency
0. ''Maintenance:''
** It is a young project, with a simple package, but upstream seems to be reactive as this a new vital part of gimp. 
** This package may be managed by the desktop team as a dependency of gimp.
